TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EditorPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class EditorPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含一个 控件集合，这些控件用于编辑 控件的属性、布局、外观和行为。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是只读的集合控件，通常由区域来跟踪的一套由区域所包含控件。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by an zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 当 Web 部件页进入编辑模式，并且用户选择要编辑的控件时，编辑过程开始。When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins. 该区域创建一个新对象组成由区域所包含控件。The zone creates a new object consisting of the controls contained by the zone. 在编辑过程中的各个阶段，在该区域访问对象保存或检索属性值之间集合中的控件和控制当前正在编辑。At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the object to save or retrieve property values between the controls in the collection and the control currently being edited. 您可以创建为你自己的编程使用，例如，您需要执行大量操作的一组上的控件的集合控件。You can create an collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使对象是只读的您可以以编程方式更改到基础控件集合中引用的属性。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种用法的类。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有四个部分此代码示例：There are four parts to this code example: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自定义的类名为控件`TextDisplayWebPart`，这在网页中引用和由编辑控件。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is edited by the controls. - 引用的网页`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，包含控件的多个控件从该区域中设置声明的 Web 部件控件并包含一些事件驱动的代码，用于创建和操作对象。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains an control with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains some event-driven code to create and manipulate an object. - 在浏览器中加载时的代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 此代码示例的第一个部分是使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 代码示例的第二部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示这两种方法编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 请注意，该控件包含一个名为属性`ContentText`; 此属性包含用户在文本框中输入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. 可以编辑此自定义属性，当控件处于编辑模式，以及标准控件属性。This custom property can be edited when the control is in edit mode, along with the standard control properties. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，``元素的页包含三个声明控件。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for three controls. 两个这些控件成为自定义的一部分时创建的对象`Button1_Click`方法执行。Two of these controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，您可以切换页面置于编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮以查看对影响操作的代码创建的控件对象。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the controls that are created by the code that is manipulating the object. 另请注意，控制允许您编辑自定义`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性。Also, notice that the control allows you to edit the custom `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property. 这可能是因为该属性标记与`WebBrowsable`控件的源代码中的属性。This is possible because the property is marked with a `WebBrowsable` attribute in the source code for the control. 如果更新编辑 UI 中的属性值，必须将页返回到正常浏览模式以查看更新的效果`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`属性。If you update the property value in the editing UI, you must return the page to normal browse mode to see the effect of updating the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的空的新实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的空实例类。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 在内部使用此构造函数的重载类在其方法来创建一个空集合对象。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 然后，区域创建的所有实例控件在子区域模板中，声明和使用内部方法来将它们添加到集合。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection. 不能使用此重载构造函数创建的新实例并添加控件添加到它。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of and add controls to it. 必须使用的其他重载之一构造函数相反。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection editorParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化的实例类，并传入的集合控件。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 这是的一个重载可用来创建一个新的构造函数对象，并添加控件添加到它。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 即使构造函数创建的实例是只读的你仍可以访问个人以编程方式控制集合中并调用其属性和方法。Even though the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用的一种常见方案构造函数将是你想要执行批处理操作时的整个集控件，如更改内容、 外观或集团相关的位置。One common scenario for using the constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them. 使用的另一个常见方案构造函数开发自定义你想要将服务器控件，与相关联，以便用户可以编辑您的控件上的自定义属性的控件。Another common scenario for using the constructor is developing custom controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control. 在此方案中，服务器控件必须实现接口，并为该任务的一部分，它必须实现方法。In this scenario, your server control must implement the interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the method. 在该方法中，若要启用自定义来编辑服务器控件，必须添加控件控件添加到实例，如对象。In that method, to enable the custom controls to edit your server control, you must add the controls to an instance, such as an object. 然后可以将传递的集合控件添加到构造函数创建一个新对象，其中区域用于设置所有控件，并开始编辑过程。Then you can pass the collection of controls to the constructor to create a new object, which the zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义，即使集合是只读的仍需执行批处理操作，若要更改单个集合中的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom and, even though the collection is read-only, still perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建对象中，添加两个三网页中的对象，控制，然后创建一个新对象使用构造函数。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, adds two of the three controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它还演示了如何可以对基础进行更改控件，即使集合是只读的也是如此。It also demonstrates how you can make changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection is read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 可以在浏览器页面加载并切换到编辑模式下通过选择页面**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。You can load the page in a browser and switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮以查看对两个效果添加到控件对象。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the two controls that are added to the object.

param.span: 要测试其是否为集合成员的 。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示集合中是否存在 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否特定控件已存在于对象。The method determines whether a specific control is already in the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定某个特定控件处于对象。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether a particular control is in an object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件不会添加`LayoutEditorPart1`控制对对象时它将添加其他控件。The code in the `Button1_Click` event does not add the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the object when it adds the other controls. 若要确认`LayoutEditorPart1`控件不在集合中，该代码使用方法。To confirm that the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is not in the collection, the code uses the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，您可以切换页面置于编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the all the controls. 如果单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，您将注意到的背景色`LayoutEditorPart1`控件是不同于其他控件，因为它不属于对象。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the background color of the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is different from the other controls, because it is not part of the object.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 控件的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法时，你想要创建可以包含一个自定义数组中的控件对象，这些控件的子集或超集的这些控件。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法创建的自定义数组控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a custom array of controls. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建的数组控件，添加`LayoutEditorPart1`为数组，然后使用控件方法以将从控件复制到数组的对象。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an array of controls, adds the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the array, and then uses the method to copy the controls from the object to the array. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，您可以切换页面置于编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，你会注意到，自定义数组中的所有控件的标题会列出页面底部附近。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the titles of all the controls in the custom array are listed near the bottom of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 引用集合的一个空的静态只读实例。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 静态、 只读的、 空实例减少了要从方法返回的错误的对象类型，或要与另一个对象实例比较的空集合实例，但不需要将成员添加到的内存使用情况实例。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

span.span: An that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 一个整数，对应于集合中的 控件的索引。

span.span: An integer that corresponds to the index of an control in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有多个方法非常有用控件上，Web 部件页，并且需要在集合中查找特定的控件。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来查找控制中对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate an control in an object. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的代码`Button1_Click`事件创建对象，然后使用方法来查找`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制在集合中，并设置其属性。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, and then uses the method to locate the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control in the collection, and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，您可以切换页面置于编辑模式下通过选择**编辑**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 可以单击标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头）`TextDisplayWebPart`控件，然后单击**编辑**编辑该控件。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 编辑用户界面 (UI) 可见时，您可以看到所有控件。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果单击**创建 EditorPartCollection**按钮，您将注意到，`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控件，它是页面底部附近，具有一个标题，但没有边框。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control, which is near the bottom of the page, has a title but no border.
